medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient has a 2-day history of abdominal pain localized to the right side. Symptoms include two episodes of emesis the day prior to presentation. The patient experienced constipation, followed by diarrhea after taking milk of magnesium. Additionally, he reports chills but denies fever, night sweats, or anorexia.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Hypertension, morbid obesity, saddle pulmonary embolus
medical_history.family_history: His mother had breast cancer and had genetic testing that was negative. He thinks his grandmother may have had a blood disorder. He is not aware of any other family history of blood clots or multiple miscarriages.
